1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Ralph,
You are very welcome. There are no pay period options in the sense of you are guaranteed to be paid every week, every two weeks etc. We run payroll every week on Tuesday for a pay date of Friday. If you have money in your Business Center on Tuesday in time for payroll, you will get paid that week, if not then you will not get paid. We do not pay you until after we have received payment from your client. So it is important to try to get weekly or bi-weekly invoicing cycles for us to invoice your client because as long as they pay on time, you are likely to have money in your Business Center more frequently to allow you to be on payroll, versus if they have monthly invoicing net 30, well we can only send them one invoice a month and they will pay the invoice 30 days from the day you receive it, so the first month you are working, you won’t get paid for around 60 days and then it is every 30 days thereafter. Please give me a call if you have additional questions about this and I will be happy to clarify.
Thank you and have a great day, Nicolette
